text: Ðeos racu <is> fullicor on <ðære> oðre bec. & <we> <hi> forbudon on <ðyssere> þy læs þe <hit> <æþryt> þince gif <heo> on ægðre bec <beo>.

Gif hwa smeað hwæt se moyses wære: þonne secge we þæt he wæs se mann se ðe god spræc to gelomlice. & he wæs heretoga þæs folces þe god gelædde mid miclum wundrum of egypta lande. & hi eodon ofer ða readan sæ <mid> <drium> fotum. & siððan god hi fedde feowertig wintra mid heofenlicum mete: & þæs folces wæs six hund þusend wigendra manna & fif hund manna & fiftig. ælce dæig. him com to heofonlic mete. ne hi ne eredon. ne ne teolodon. ne heora reaf næs <forwered>. binnan þam feowertigum gearum.
Ða sette god æ. þæm folce & het þone moysen. awritan þæm folce fif ænlice bec. & he wæs þa mid gode & sette þa fif bec. be godes dihte.

Hu god geworhte heofonas & eorðan. & ealle gesceafta, & awrat eac on ðære gesetnysse þæt nan man ne scolde bugan to nanum deofulgilde. ac scolde gehwa hine gebiddan to gode anum. se ðe ana is soð god.

Ne nan man ne sceolde nemnian godes naman to nanre ydelnysse, & scolde gehwa freolsian þone sunnandæg. mid arwyrðnysse: and scolde arwyrðian his fæder. & his moder. & se ðe wyrigð oððe gremað fæder & moder he bið deaðes scyldig.
He cwæð eac ne hæm ðu unrihtlice Ne ofslyh ðu mann. ne stala ðu ne beo ðu leasgewita. ne gewilna ðu oðres mannes wifes. ne ðu ne ge oðres mannes æhta.
Ðas word sindon openlice gesæde: þeahhwæðre. on ælcum ðæra worda is sum ðincg digle. & behofað smeagunge.
